title: Right-To-Left text support
body:
I'm trying to draw some Right-To-Left unicode text (Like Arabic or Persian) using DrawText method, but there is a problem with text rendering.
After finding the font, using the FontManager, I could draw the text, but it's in Left-To-Right order (like english) and the characters are separated, while right to left languages contains sticking-characters.
Is there any fix or workaround for this issue?
